CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 23, 1960, pg. 1 reads: "It Was in 1905 - Seven of the 10 veteran Metropolitan members, who were among the group which marched into the present church edifice when it was erected in 1905, stood with the pastor as they were cited during the recent centennial anniversary celebration of the church. Those present, left to right: Mrs. Mary Taylor, Rev. O.L. Simms, pastor; Mrs. Margaret Carpenter, Mrs. Elizabeth Hopson, Mrs. Mittie Goins, Mrs. Alice Carter, R.A. Carpenter and Mrs. Fannie Scott. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Metropolitan Baptist Church members, from left: Mary Taylor, Rev. O. L. Simms, Margaret Carpenter, Elizabeth Hopson, Mittie Goins, Alice Carter, R. A. Carpenter, and Fannie Scott, posed for centennial anniversary celebration
